nodes.text: Steel Hand of Palawa was a title or rank held by members of the Followers of Palawa, a Force sect found on Bunduki. According to a debriefing overseen by Grand Inquisitor Laddinare Torbin in 4 BBY, Arden Lyn—a Follower of Palawa and leader of the Legions of Lettow—claimed to have held this title prior to her visit to Pelgrin to learn of her future from the Oracle.
